synopsis.text:
If you're a fan of magical folklore and cunning creatures, this anime is sure to captivate you! Set under the ethereal glow of a full moon, the story unfolds in an abandoned temple, a place teeming with spirits and magic. The temple becomes the battleground for two legendary tricksters from Japanese folklore: a sly fox spirit and a mischievous tanuki (raccoon dog).

The fox, a seasoned shapeshifter, takes the form of a samurai and attempts to assert dominance over the tanuki. Unwilling to back down, the tanuki rallies reinforcements, enlisting the help of his father. The stage is set for a thrilling duel of wit, magic, and deception as the two mythical creatures engage in a battle of one-upmanship. With the tanuki boasting an extensive repertoire of tricks and the fox relying on its wealth of experience, it's anyone's guess who will emerge victorious. Prepare to be enthralled by this enchanting tale of magical rivalry!
